name: Non-Fellows
description:
A chance meeting can't lead to a long-lasting friendship. Or can it?

While there is little in common between these four young people, but the life throws all the kind of adventures they have to brave together:
  • Find out how a pieceful town suddenly became full of zombies
  • Discover an ancient vampire, who is definitely looking for human sacrifices
  • Get into the university, even though you probably couldn't pass an exam in your life

The game includes all 3 episodes of classical 2011 point-and-click adventure game, and features light-hearted script, bright anumesque art, full voiceover and several mini-games.

Characters


A little blonde angel, who will be sweet and smiling until you accidentally spoil her hairdo – or stain her new blouse at the cost of a new car.


She loves her old Harley Davidson and… and, well, nothing except that. She can solve most of her problems on her own and hates asking anyone for help. She also hates the ones who cause those problems.


Calm to phlegmatism, he is difficult to surprise or upset. He treats girls with a slight allowance, but as a true gentleman he is always eager to help them. This feature, however, often collides with his laziness.


He is always good-looking and good-mannered. Being everybody’s favourite, he uses this circumstance shamelessly. Not everyone is sure if he can feel shame at all, though. On the other hand, he’s got money and insolence.
